hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.description: Passionate Full Stack Developer experienced in building modern web and mobile applications. I combine strong frontend expertise (Angular, React, React Native) with solid backend proficiency using Spring Boot.

description.first: As a passionate Full Stack Developer, I specialize in designing and developing web and mobile applications by blending strong frontend skills (Angular, React, React Native) with backend expertise in Java and Spring Boot.
description.second: I focus on building robust, maintainable, and secure architectures while delivering smooth and intuitive user experiences.
description.third: Throughout my journey, I’ve worked on complex projects integrating advanced authentication systems (Keycloak, JWT), secure REST APIs, dynamic forms, and efficient backend business logic.

services.title: What I Do ?
services.description: I provide end-to-end solutions to help you design, build, and optimize your digital products for the web and mobile platforms.

webDevelopment.title: Web Development
webDevelopment.description: Building responsive, scalable, and dynamic web applications using modern frameworks like Angular and React.

mobileDevelopment.title: Mobile Development
mobileDevelopment.description: Creating high-performance cross-platform mobile apps with React Native for seamless user experiences.

backendDevelopment.title: Backend Development
backendDevelopment.description: Designing and implementing reliable backend systems with Java and Spring Boot to support secure and efficient APIs.

uiuxDesign.title: UI/UX Design
uiuxDesign.description: Designing visually appealing and user-centric interfaces that enhance engagement and usability.

seoOptimization.title: SEO Optimization
seoOptimization.description: Improving your website’s visibility through optimized structures, metadata, and content to boost organic traffic.

services.contact: Ready to start your next project? Let’s make it happen!

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: I have a strong background in full stack development with deep expertise in Angular, React, React Native, and Spring Boot.

job1.description: As a Frontend Developer at Royal Air Maroc, I contribute to the design, development, and optimization of web and mobile applications that enhance customer experience and operational efficiency.
achievements: Developed version 2 of the RAM Assistant mobile app.
Designed and maintained the ATLAS Chatbot for real-time flight information and customer assistance.
Built Flight Watch — a real-time dashboard to monitor aircraft operations and flight statuses.

job2.description: Launched my professional career by developing client-focused websites and learning modern development workflows. Gained hands-on experience across the full stack.
achievements: Contributed to the design and development of the Mohammed VI Foundation (FM6) website.
Contributed to the design and development of the Agricultural Development Agency (ADA) website.
Worked closely with multidisciplinary teams to gather requirements and deliver tailored digital solutions.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind or want to collaborate? I'd love to hear from you.
contact.footer: All rights reserved. Built with React & Tailwind CSS.

edu2.school: Faculty of Sciences Ibn Zohr Agadir

edu3.degree: Diploma (Bac +2) Specialized Technician in Software Development
